text: "Drive Slow" is a song on the Late Registration album released by rapper Kanye West on August 30th, 2005 and published by Rock-A-Fella Records, the fifth song in the album. The track goes for 4:32 and its signature 1 beat a second sets the tone for the song. == Reference == Category:2005 songs Category:Kanye West songs
title: Drive Slow
